name: imap_mailboxmsginfo
purpose: Get information about the current mailbox

return.description:
Returns the information in an object with following properties:
   
    Mailbox properties
    
     
      
       Date
       date of last change (current datetime)
      
      
       Driver
       driver
      
      
       Mailbox
       name of the mailbox
      
      
       Nmsgs
       number of messages
      
      
       Recent
       number of recent messages
      
      
       Unread
       number of unread messages
      
      
       Deleted
       number of deleted messages
      
      
       Size
       mailbox sizeReturns FALSE on failure.
